title: 1.52 Isaiah and Micah, Prophets of the Assyrian Crisis
itunes:title: Isaiah and Micah, Prophets of the Assyrian Crisis
description: Isaiah's ambiguity has made him a crowd-pleaser for over 2,500 years. He introduces a bunch of shiny-new theological ideas previously unknown in the Bible. Christians read into his book prophecies of the Christ. Micah is his counterpoint.
content:encoded: Isaiah's ambiguity has made him a crowd-pleaser for over 2,500 years. He introduces a bunch of shiny-new theological ideas previously unknown in the Bible. Christians read into his book prophecies of the Christ. Micah is his counterpoint.
itunes:subtitle: Isaiah is the first super-star prophet, beloved by both Jews and Christians. Micah, not so much.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
